alert.note: Alert for Davis; Wapello (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 11:44PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Gusty winds will impact portions of Monroe, eastern Lucas, Poweshiek, Davis, Wapello, Marion, Wayne, Mahaska, Appanoose and eastern Jasper Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1142 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of New Sharon to 7 miles northeast of Chariton to 8 miles north of Mercer. Movement was east at 45 mph. A boundary moving well ahead of the storm was producing wind gusts over 40 MPH. The gusty winds will arrive well before the actual thunderstorms do. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... New Sharon around 1155 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Corydon, Montezuma, Eddyville, Victor, Ottumwa, Centerville, Ottumwa Industrial Airport and Lake Sundown. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 165 and 204. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
